channel.title: Simple question
channel.description: Im using source pk planet v3, and i downloaded the client, how do i change the ip to mine?

item.title: Simple question
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

I believe it’s in client class, search for 127.0.0.1 (localhost) and change it to your ip ;).

Read full topic

item.title: Simple question
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Not sure if it’s the same thing, but i just searched PK planet and found this.

Go into client.java in the Clients Main Directory and search for something in this quote.
Replace the addresses in the quotation marks with either you local IP or your port-forwarded address.

public int GetWorld(int PlayerID) { String Server = PlayerHandler.players[PlayerID].playerServer; 
            if (Server.equals("pkplanet.servegame.com") || Server.equals("localhost")) {
                    return 1;
            } else if (Server.equals("")) {
                    return 2;
            } else {
                    println_debug("Invalid Server: " + Server);
                    return 1;
            }
    }</blockquote>

Read full topic
